title: Bigger Problem
alt: Your point that the world contains multiple problems is a real slam-dunk argument against fixing any of them.
transcript: [Cueball and White Hat are having a conversation. Cueball is holding a clipboard in his left hand.]Cueball: I'm trying to fix <problem with the world>. Can you help?White Hat: It's obvious you don't actually care. If you did, you'd be trying to fix <bigger problem> instead.Cueball: Okay, want to help fix <bigger problem>?White Hat: No, for another reason I'll think of later.
